ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry the post is so long. * Iron Raptor sighs, they were ready. Now this nightmare should either end by the time they re through with this...or they should

Sorry the post is so long.

* Iron Raptor sighs, they were ready.
Now this nightmare should either end by the time they're through with 
this...or they should all be dead.
She sighed and growled. Well, that's one way of looking at it.*

IRIS: " Now you need expose your spark, and then tap into her own spark 
signature to expose it as well.
A Transmetal 2 spark is much more powerful then hers, despite the beast 
modes.
Anyway, after that simply release the code 34-9 from your spark reconductory 
code. Which, in face, is a code which is made to make sure that your spark 
does NOT merge with anothers. As well, believe it or not, should have mede 
sure that you never breed."

* And just as Iris did sometimes, she continued on relaying information on a 
subject that had almost nothing to do with what was going on at the moment.*

IRIS: " And the reason that most Transmetal 2s have that code so that they 
can't breed is mainly because the Transmetal 2 technology is unstable to 
begin with.
Also because most TM2, which Dinobot is the only one I've seen with this 
particular trait,  are fused with ultra-aggressive tendencies.
And that code's in place to make sure that those traits aren't passed on."

* Irin Raptor growled*

" Alright, Iris. We get the point."

* Iris stopped, ready to defend her point.*

IRIS: " Well, I'm just merly stating the facts. Besides, it's a good thing 
that TM2s have that code, because it appears to me that only Dinobot has 
those unstable traits, it's a comfort to know that if he ever gets the idea 
into his head, we won't have to worry about the second generation."

* Iron Raptor just growled again*

" That's just mean Iris!"

IRIS: " Well, it's true! Right Prowl?"

* Iron Raptor glared at Iris and then turned her face towards Prowl with a 
look that he had better not answer that question Iris had just given.
She heard Iris chuckling.*

IRIS: " Always the one to stick up the the Maximals that just happen to 
catch you eyes huh?"

* Iron Raptor snapped her head towards Iris*

" And just what was THAT supposed to mean?"

IRIS: " I mean, who can blaim you for sticking up for him, right? You are 
the same spicies. I guess it's only natural."

* Iron Raptor just rolled her eyes.*

" Iris...I bet that the only reason that Dinobot's more unstable then any 
other TM2 is because that body his spark's in is the first slaging one 
Megatron ever made. The systems gets better the more it's recreated and 
used.
It's not his fault he was thrown into that hellish TM2 nightmare of a 
shell."

IRIS: " Hmm...sounds like soneone's be looking up a few things, because I 
know you're not spart enough to know that on your own. Especially when you 
never talk to the guy."

* Iron Raptor shook her head*

" So I looked it up, who gives a slag?! I always look up info on who I'm 
commanding."

IRIS: " Commanding? Oh nonononono. Whether you've noticed or not, commander, 
that bot ain't under anyones command but his own."

* Iron Raptor looked at Prowl to see if he thought that this conversation 
was as inappropriate as she thought it was.
But Iris continued.*

IRIS: " And you have to admit, that X Pred..."

* She was cut off right away by a quick slap to the monitor by Iron Raptor, 
making the screen fuzz for a few moments and then come back.*

IRIS: " Why the slag did you do that?!!"

* Iron Raptor snickered and sat on her haunches, looking at Prowl with an 
ammused look on her face.*

" Oh, I just thought it was about time we got on to that merge you were 
yapping about before.
If Iris would have been a bird it wasn't hard to know that her feathers 
would have been ruffled.*

IRIS: " Well, I guess this just goes to show how much you people appresiate 
knowledge these days.
And I've already told you jackasses what you need to do.
Just break the code and your sparks should do the rest!"

* If Iris could have turned away she would have.*
